name: Cross Fire (itch)
description:
Cross fire is a 2D pixel game for 2 players, based on fighting with swords, in which you will be able to face your friend in fun pvp duels, where you will be able to perform both physical and long-range attacks with the aim of defeating your opponent as much as necessary to be able to cross between levels, ending in the round or level 3 that will determine the winner.

Cross fire es un juego 2D pixel para 2 jugadores, basado en enfrentamientos con espadas, en el que podrás enfrentarte a tu amigo en divertidos duelos pvp, en donde podrás realizar tanto ataques físicos como de largo alcance con el objetivo de derrotar a tu oponente tanto como sea necesario para poder cruzar entre niveles, con fin en la ronda o nivel 3 que determinará al ganador.
